meanings.definition: Feeling or showing tiredness or fatigue.
meanings.sent1: After the long hike, Sarah felt wearier than ever before.
meanings.sent2: The wearier he became, the slower his movements were.
meanings.sent3: Even the energetic puppy looked wearier than usual after playing all day.
meanings.sent4: The wearier sky seemed to sag under the weight of the dark clouds.
meanings.sent5: His wearier expression spoke volumes about his exhausting day.

meanings.definition: Causing or characterized by tiredness or fatigue.
meanings.sent1: The wearier tasks left him drained by the end of the day.
meanings.sent2: The wearier weather made everyone want to stay indoors.
meanings.sent3: The wearier music played softly in the background, lulling him to sleep.
meanings.sent4: The wearier road seemed to stretch on endlessly into the distance.
meanings.sent5: The wearier routine felt like a heavy burden on his shoulders.
